Flow.description: Refactored Flow for CCCM-24000, simplified and cleaned

formulas.description: Designed to be paired with JS to extract data only containing values on index
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Data_Extract1
formulas.expression: CASE({!VCC_T2T_Count_Mopulnavir}, 0, IF({!Patient_has_a_drug_drug_interaction_that_preclude_Paxlovid_use}, "True", "False"), 1, IF({!Patient_has_encountered_side_effects_that_preclude_continued_Paxlovid_use}, "True", "False"), 2, IF({!Patient_has_contraindications_for_Paxlovid_use}, "True", "False"), 3, IF({!Patient_declines_Paxlovid}, "True","False"), 4, IF({!molConsentCheckbox}, "True", "False"), 5, TEXT(MONTH({!Positive_SARS_CoV_2_test})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!Positive_SARS_CoV_2_test})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!Positive_SARS_CoV_2_test})), 6, {!Symptom_Details}, 7, {!Patient_has_met_ALL_the_above_criteria}, 8, TEXT(MONTH({!Report_of_last_menstrual_period})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!Report_of_last_menstrual_period})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!Report_of_last_menstrual_period})), 9, {!Pregnant_Patients}, 10, IF({!pregnancySurveillaceProgramAwarnessCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 11, IF({!PSPAwarenessifBecomePregnantCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 12, IF({!reviewedContraceptionRequirementsPerMolFactSheetCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 13, IF({!molnupiravirUserConsentDispositionCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 14, IF({!molnupiravirPatientAdverseReactionReportAwarenessCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 15, IF({!Patient_does_not_qualify_currently_for_either_Paxlovid_or_Molnupiravir}, "True", "False"), null )

formulas.description: Designed to be paired with JS to extract data only containing values on index
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Data_Extract2
formulas.expression: CASE({!VCC_T2T_Count_Mopulnavir}, 0, {!d_dInteractionPrecludePaxUseReasonText}, 1, {!encounteredSideEffectsPrecludePaxlovidUseReasonText}, 2, {!contradicationsPaxlovidUseReasonText}, 3, {!declinesPaxlovidReasonText}, 4, IF( OR( {!Patient_has_met_ALL_the_above_criteria} = 'Yes', {!Patient_has_met_ALL_the_above_criteria} = 'No' ), 'Reviewed', '' ), 5, TEXT(MONTH({!Symptoms_onset_within_5_days})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!Symptoms_onset_within_5_days})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!Symptoms_onset_within_5_days})), 6, IF( OR( {!Patient_has_met_ALL_the_above_criteria} = 'Yes', {!Patient_has_met_ALL_the_above_criteria} = 'No' ), 'Reviewed', '' ), 7, {!Was_patient_male_at_birth}, 8, TEXT(MONTH({!Negative_pregnancy_test})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!Negative_pregnancy_test})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!Negative_pregnancy_test})), 9, IF({!pregnancyBenefitandRisksCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 10, IF({!PatientAgreestoParticipateinPregnancySurveillanceCheckbox}, "True", "False"), 11, IF({!patientAgreestoParticipateInPSPifPregnantCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 12, {!dosageandAdministrationDisplayText}, 13, IF({!molnupiravirTreatmentEnrollmentCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 14, {!Request_denied_due_to_the_following}, 15, "End of Mopulnavir Subflow", null )

formulas.description: Data parsing for fields and labels in the flow, preparation to move into string collection >>> VCV_Subflow_Assign_Collection
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Data_Parse_Label_Mol
formulas.expression: CASE({!VCC_T2T_Count_Mopulnavir}, 0, "Patient has a drug-drug interaction that preclude Paxlovid use", 1, "Patient has encountered side effects that preclude continued Paxlovid use", 2, "Patient has contraindications for Paxlovid use", 3, "Patient declines Paxlovid", 4, {!MolConsentDisplayTxtVar}, 5, "Positive SARS-CoV-2 test", 6, "Symptom Details", 7, "Patient has met ALL the above criteria", 8, "Report of last menstrual period", 9, "Is the Patient Pregnant?", 10, {!pregnancySurveillanceProgramAwarenessDisplayTxtVar}, 11, {!PSPAwarenessIfBecomePregnantDisplayTxtVar}, 12, {!reviewedContraceptionRequirementspeMolnupiravirProvidersFactSheetDisplayTxtVar}, 13, {!molnupiravirUserConsentDispositionDisplayTxtVar}, 14, {!molnupiravirPatientAdverseReactionReportAwarenessDisplayTxtVar}, 15, "Patient does not qualify currently for either Paxlovid or Molnupiravir", null )

formulas.description: Formula that runs the other half of the original formula in parallel in order to exceed the formula word limitation
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Data_Parse_Label_Mol2
formulas.expression: CASE({!VCC_T2T_Count_Mopulnavir}, 0, "Please provide comment", 1, "Please provide comment", 2, "Please provide comment", 3, "Please provide comment", 4, {!MolLimitationDisplayTxtVar}, 5, "Symptoms onset within 5 days", 6, {!molCriteriaDisplayTxtVar}, 7, "Was patient male at birth?", 8, "Negative pregnancy test", 9, {!potentialRiskandBenefitDisplayTxtVar}, 10, {!patientAgreestoParticipateinPregnancySurveillanceProgramDisplayTxtVar}, 11, {!patientAgreesToParticipateinPSPIfBecomePregnantDisplayTxtVar}, 12, "Dosage", 13, {!molnupiravirTreatmentEnrollmentDisplayTxtVar}, 14, "Request denied due to the following", 15, "End of Mopulnavir Subflow" & " : " & "End", null )

Flow.interviewLabel: VCC COVID Test to Treat Subflow: Molnupiravir {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} {!recordId}
Flow.label: VCC COVID Test to Treat Subflow: Molnupiravir

fields.name: Report_of_last_menstrual_period
fields.helpText: In an individual who has regular menstrual cycles, uses a reliable method of contraception correctly and consistently or has had a negative pregnancy test.

fields.name: Negative_pregnancy_test
fields.helpText: Recommended but not required if other criteria are not met.

fields.name: nonPregnantPatients
fields.fieldText: Non-Pregnant Patients

fields.name: Request_denied_due_to_the_following
fields.fieldText: Request denied due to the following

fields.name: Patient_does_not_qualify_currently_for_either_Paxlovid_or_Molnupiravir
fields.fieldText: Patient does not qualify currently for either Paxlovid or Molnupiravir

fields.name: molConsentDisplayTxt
fields.fieldText:
{!MolConsentDisplayTxtVar}


FDA Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) Fact Sheet for Molnupiravir

fields.name: consentDisplayText
fields.fieldText: {!molCriteriaDisplayTxtVar} (People with certain medical conditions - CDC)

fields.name: Patient_has_met_ALL_the_above_criteria
fields.fieldText: Patient has met ALL the above criteria

fields.name: Patient_has_a_drug_drug_interaction_that_preclude_Paxlovid_use
fields.fieldText: Patient has a drug-drug interaction that preclude Paxlovid use

fields.name: Patient_has_encountered_side_effects_that_preclude_continued_Paxlovid_use
fields.fieldText: Patient has encountered side effects that preclude continued Paxlovid use

fields.name: Patient_has_contraindications_for_Paxlovid_use
fields.fieldText: Patient has contraindications for Paxlovid use

validationRule.errorMessage: Please provide at least one reason for choosing Molnupiravir

variables.description: Collection variable used to carry the progress of the previous flow to this one
variables.name: VCC_T2T_Labels_Temp_Mol

variables.description: used to reset loop with null value
variables.name: VCC_T2T_Nulll
